com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.client

Interface ClientInformation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientInformationImpl

    public interface ClientInformation
    The ClientInformation is used to specify all client-specific information. This also includes the client signature used to acquire a license from the Acrolinx Server. Most of the information will be shown in checking report and reporting database.
    Use AcrolinxFactory.clientInformations() to create.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBuildNumber() 
      String getClientApplicationName()

    • Method Detail

      • getBuildNumber

        int getBuildNumber()
        Returns:
        The build number of the client or plug-in.

      • getHostName

        String getHostName()
        Returns:
        The host name of the computer the client currently runs on.

      • getClientName

        String getClientName()
        Returns:
        The name of the client or plug-in.

      • getVersion

        String getVersion()
        Returns:
        The version of the client or plug-in.

      • getSystemLoginName

        String getSystemLoginName()
        Returns:
        The system login name of the current user.

      • getClientApplicationName

        String getClientApplicationName()
        Returns:
        The client application name. If it is a plug-in to another application, it should be "Acrolinx for " + host-application-name.

      • getClientSignature

        String getClientSignature()
        A ClientSignature is used to identify a client. Each type of client (not each installed instance) should have a unique client signature. You may receive a ClientSignature from Acrolinx which is then referenced in your Acrolinx Server license. For testing purposes you may use ClientInformationBuilder.withTrialClientSignature().
